```{r}
librarian::shelf(
  dplyr, gh, glue, knitr, tidyjson,
  quiet = T)

org   <- "MarineSensitivities"
```

## Get Descriptions

```{r}
gh(glue("GET /orgs/{org}/repos")) |> 
  spread_all() |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  select(name, description) |>
  arrange(name) |> 
  kable()
```
